genmean: A high level surface that suddenly drops down, more or less vertically, at one end, such as the corner of a box or the end of a shelve, or any thing or any action directly or indirectly associated with this, especially a cliff.
oldentry: Popular explanation: the line of an even surface which suddenly drops'
nomlex: 1. A high area of land which a very steep side, especially one next to the sea. English = cliff.
